name: NPR
text:
North Korea will cut off all communications with South Korea and treat it as an "enemy," according to North Korea's state media. 

The move comes just a month after the countries traded fire at their heavily patrolled border.
https://t.co/FWEc5XDOnz

name: NPR
text:
NEW: CrossFit CEO Greg Glassman has resigned. 

He had come in under fire in recent days for inflammatory comments he made about the Black Lives Matter movement.
https://t.co/HhHFxDFeZq

name: NPR
text:
Activists in Bristol, U.K., had spent years trying to remove the statue of slave trader Edward Colston, to no avail.

In the end, the statue's fate was not resolved by lawmakers in Bristol, but by a killing on a sidewalk in Minneapolis.  
https://t.co/OEWfA1T0jc
